resources.string: Canvs is an interactive guide for discovering your city\'s best street art and the artists behind them!

we want to engage the community through the love of urban art in digital platform.Canvs is about sharing the stories behind the murals and the communities they\'re in. Most importantly, we want to give respect to the artists who breathe life into these cities.

Mean Genius is a experience design collective from New Jersey-fueling big ideas through design, interactivity and collabration. our goal is to continue to break down creative barriers and lead a unique approach to imagination and innovation

Cruxcode specializes in rich,dynamic content that brings mobile applications to life.With a strong background in video,animation,photography, and UI, we aim to bridge the gap between good design and rock-solid functionality, Contact us with any ideas or inquires!
You haven\'t bookmarked any murals yet. What are you waiting for!
You don\'t have any favorite yet! Mark murals as favorite to see them here.
Reach out to us with any comments, collabration opportunities, feedback or concerns. We\'d love to hear from you!
